message:
Please clarify what happens to the calling method when you say:

If “await” sees that the awaitable has not completed, then it acts asynchronously. It tells the awaitable to run the remainder of the method when it completes, and then returns from the async method.

why I say this is because sometimes you are deep in method calls and not sure what happens some where up the chain of calls. Eg, some where up the chain you are probably in a non async situation.
